subject: Clean Air for a Healthy Life
body:
The PurePro














The PurePro is easy to use and whisper quiet. An easy top-loading electronic filter makes cleaning simple. You can sleep in peace with the whisper quiet fan, and its simple three-speed operation.
The PurePro eliminates airborne contaminants as small as .01 micron! It removes microscopic particles such as mold spores, bacteria and viruses. It captures allergens such as pollen, dust and dust mites, pet hair, pet dander and other household pollutants. It filters cigarette smoke, pet odors and chemical fumes while revitalizing the air!
CLICK HERE TO ORDER ONLINE!
